pages.text: The people around you have already helped you in one or the other dicey situation. It's time to give something back. A pinch of $(l:resources/shimmerstone)Shimmerstone$(/l) allows the package to explode in a colorful shower of particles.$(br)Click the Present onto the items you want to gift, wrap it in a $(thing)Crafting Table$(), then all you have to do is place it down for the recipient to open it and watch them jump in joy.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)(Or, you know, you can always gift your future self!)

pages.title: Adding Color
pages.text: Place a filled Present in a crafting grid to wrap it.$(br2)You can additionally add:$(li)$(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() for a colorful particle shower in those pigments colors.

pages.title: Wrapping Papers
pages.text: $(li)Special ingredients to choose from a variety of wrapping papers:$(li2)Red Dye: Red$(li2)Blue Dye: Blue$(li2)Cyan Dye: Cyan$(li2)Green Dye: Green$(li2)Purple Dye: Purple$(li2)Cake: Cake$(li2)Flower: Stripes$(li2)Firework Star: Starry$(li2)Sapling: Winter$(li2)Spore Blossom: Rainbow
